Episodes.Title: The Rickshank Rickdemption

Episodes.Writer: Justin Roiland, Dan Harmon, Mike McMahan
Episodes.Actors: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer
Episodes.Plot: Rick, still in galactic prison, puts an intricate escape plan into action. Back on Earth, which is now under federation control, Morty and Summer have an argument about their grandpa.

Episodes.Title: Rickmancing the Stone

Episodes.Writer: Dan Harmon, Justin Roiland, Jane Becker
Episodes.Actors: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer
Episodes.Plot: With the kids dealing with their parents' divorce, Rick takes them to a Mad Max-style universe where he tries to steal a green crystal from a group of scavengers.

Episodes.Title: Pickle Rick

Episodes.Writer: Justin Roiland, Dan Harmon, Jessica Gao
Episodes.Actors: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer
Episodes.Plot: Rick turns himself into a pickle while Beth, Summer, and Morty go to family therapy.

Episodes.Plot: Rick and Morty are summoned by the Vindicators to stop Worldender but end up in a deathtrap conceived by Drunk Rick.

Episodes.Actors: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer
Episodes.Plot: Rick takes Jerry on a sympathy adventure to a resort where everyone is immortal when there, and Jerry meets some old acquaintances of Rick's who want payback.

Episodes.Actors: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer
Episodes.Plot: Following a stressful adventure, Rick and Morty go on a break to a spa where they remove their toxins, which in turn take a form of their own.

Episodes.Actors: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer
Episodes.Plot: Whilst Rick and Morty go off to adventure in Atlantis, we take a look at how the Citadel has rebuilt itself since both Rick and Morty visited.

Episodes.Writer: Justin Roiland, Dan Harmon, Jane Becker
Episodes.Actors: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer
Episodes.Plot: Rick reveals to Morty his "Morty's mind blowers," a collection of memories Morty asked Rick to erase from his mind.

Episodes.Writer: Justin Roiland, Dan Harmon, Mike McMahan
Episodes.Actors: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer
Episodes.Plot: Rick brings Beth to a world he created for her when she was younger while Beth looks for a long-lost childhood friend trapped there for years.
